oracle.kubernetes.operator.work.Fiber

  • Packages that use Fiber 
    Package Description
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.work
    User-level thread infrastructure for the Operator.

    • Uses of Fiber in oracle.kubernetes.operator.work

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fiber Fiber.createChildFiber()
      Creates a child Fiber.
      Fiber Engine.createFiber()
      Creates a new fiber in a suspended state.
      static Fiber Fiber.current()
      Gets the current fiber that's running.
      static Fiber Fiber.getCurrentIfSet()
      Gets the current fiber that's running, if set.
      Fiber FiberGate.startFiber(String key, Step strategy, Packet packet, Fiber.CompletionCallback callback)
      Starts Fiber that cancels any earlier running Fibers with the same key.
      Fiber FiberGate.startFiberIfLastFiberMatches(String key, Fiber old, Step strategy, Packet packet, Fiber.CompletionCallback callback)
      Starts Fiber only if the last started Fiber matches the given old Fiber.
      Fiber FiberGate.startFiberIfNoCurrentFiber(String key, Step strategy, Packet packet, Fiber.CompletionCallback callback)
      Starts Fiber only if there is no running Fiber with the same key.
